title: New York City Marathon: Sharon Lokedi and Evans Chebet Complete a Kenyan Sweep
description: Chebet, who also won the Boston Marathon this year, finished in 2:08:41, while his countrywoman Lokedi won in 2:23:23. Marcel Hug and Susannah Scaroni won the wheelchair divisions.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Ben Solomon for The New York Times
